attributes.action: Not be bullied by the EU and the drug companies and to support our health  choice freedoms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 23rd of March 2007 the government are forbidding the alternative health suppliers from selling in this instance the Goji Berry. People have used these berries to their benifit for years.
Today it is the Goji Berries tommorow it will be the cancer curing bitter almond seeds, the drug company's profits are affected by these simple and cheap alternatives. 
Please Mr Blair do stand up against these bullies and fight for the freedoms that have been dearly fought for over the years.
